attributes.action: Stop the Government's lifting of fracking as it does not have local support!
attributes.additional_details: We would like the Government to stop all fracking for shale gas if it does not have local support and the government need to prove that there is local support for each fracking sites across the Uk!
attributes.background: With the announcement that the government has reversed its stand on fracking for shale gas, Lizz truss said in parliament that it was only with local support that she would reverse the ban. Many locals do not support the reversal of this ban and do not want fracking!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Keep The Fracking Ban
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614611
